title: Title
noDedicatedTime: No dedicated time has been entered yet
noStatsForSelectedPeriod: No available statistics for the selected period
sureToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
sureToDeleteMulti: Are you sure you want to delete this event? As it is part of a repeated set of event, you can also delete all its matching events.
imInPsychologicalProgram: I am part of the SPO program
walkdesc1: This app was made possible by the Learning Support Service and was developed by Pierre-Antoine Deshaies, Simon Lacoursière and Vincent Ribou, graduates in computer science at Université de Sherbrooke
walkdesc2: Displays a 3-day selection and their events.
walkdesc3: Displays your schedule and allows custom event creation.
walkdesc4: Displays your performances regarding the completion of your events per week, month or session.
walkdesc5: Displays an event's details and allows you to edit them.
basicFetchError: Can't fetch data at the moment.
errorUnableToEditEvent: Sorry, we are unable to edit the event.
errorUnableToCreateEvent: Sorry, we are unable to create the event.
errorNotAuthentifiedOrInvalidCIP: It seems you are either not authentified or your CIP is invalid.
errorServerIsDown: Unable to reach the server. Make sure you are connected to the internet and try again later.
errorWhileSaving: Sorry, there was an error while creating the event.
errorCantCreateEvent: Sorry, it seems you cannot create an event at the moment.
errorEventDoesntExistOrNoFieldsChanged: Warning, either no field has been changed or the event you tried to edit doesn't exist anymore.
errorEventAlreadyDeleted: Sorry, it seems that this event has already been deleted before.
errorCantPauseEvent: Sorry, we couldn't pause your event. There seems to be some connection error with the server.
errorCantPlayEvent: Sorry, we couldn't start your event. There seems to be some connection error with the server.
addToHomeScreen: Please add the application to your home screen to install it
beforeInstalling: Before anything else, make sure you are currently using your phone's default browser.
youWillHaveToLogin: On the first launch, you will have to authenticate yourself using your usual CIP/password.
errorActivityInProgress: The activity is in progress and therefore cannot be edited while doing so
multiSaveMessage: Do you want to apply your changes to all the repeated events or only this one? Applying the changes to this event only will unlink it from its other matching events.
